CodeList.Name: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been less alert.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Have Been Less Alert

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had difficulty paying attention for long periods of time.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Have Difficulty Paying Attention for Long Time

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MFIS01-Have Been Unable to Think Clearly
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been unable to think clearly.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Unable to Think Clearly

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been clumsy and uncoordinated.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Have Been Clumsy and Uncoordinated

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been forgetful.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Have Been Forgetful

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had to pace myself in my physical activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Pace Myself in Physical Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been less motivated to do anything that requires physical effort.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Less Motivated to Do Anything That Requires Physical Effort

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been less motivated to participate in social activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Less Motivated to Participate in Social Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MFIS01-Limited in Ability Away From Home
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been limited in my ability to do things away from home.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Limited in My Abilities to Do Things Away From Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had trouble maintaining physical effort for long periods.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Have Trouble Maintain Physical Effort

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had difficulty making decisions.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Have Difficulty Making Decisions

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been less motivated to do anything that requires thinking.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Less Motivated to Do Anything That Requires Thinking

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks my muscles have felt weak.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Muscles Have Felt Weak

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been physically uncomfortable.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Been Physically Uncomfortable

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had trouble finishing tasks that require thinking.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Have Trouble Finishing Tasks That Require Thinking

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had difficulty organizing my thoughts when doing things at home or at work.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Difficulty Organizing My Thoughts

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have been less able to complete tasks that require physical effort.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Less Able to Complete Tasks That Require Physical Effort

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MFIS01-My Thinking Has Been Slowed Down
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks my thinking has been slowed down.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - My Thinking Has Been Slowed Down

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have had trouble concentrating.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Have Trouble Concentrating

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have limited my physical activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Have Limited My Physical Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MFIS01-Need to Rest More Often or Longer
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale - Because of my fatigue during the past 4 weeks I have needed to rest more often or for longer periods.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MFIS - Need to Rest More Often or Longer

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Modified Fatigue Impact Scale Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Modified Fatigue Impact Scale Test Code Terminology
